Event.name: Cognitive_impact
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Phenomenon</fen> (an external or cognitive event or situation) comes into the awareness of an <fen>Experiencer</fen>, resulting in a perceptually punctual change in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>'s conception of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen> or entities and facts associated with it.
<ex><fex name="Phenomenon">Her walk</fex> <t>struck</t> <fex name="Experiencer">me</fex> <fex name="Judgment">as odd</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Phenomenon
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the entity that evokes a cognitive reaction for the <fen>Experiencer</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Experiencer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> in the entity who experiences the cognitive impact brought about by the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Judgment
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Judgment</fen> is the characterization of the cognitive impact or evaluation of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>The physical or abstract <fen>Circumstances</fen> that determine the <fen>Judgment</fen> of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the cognitive impact of a <fen>Phenomenon</fen> affects the <fen>Judgment</fen> ascribed to it. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: strike.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: a phenomenon has a transient effect upon an experiencer causing some type of cognitive evaluation or response.

lexUnit.name: hit.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: a phenomenon has a transient effect upon an experiencer causing some type of cognitive evaluation or response.
